text: The 1971 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles was the 31st edition of the women's singles championship. Lin Hui-ching defeated Cheng Min- chih in the final by three sets to one, to win the title. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== \- Category:1971 in women's table tennis
title: 1971 World Table Tennis Championships – Women's Singles
